text:
The mod_cgid module in the Apache HTTP Server before 2.4.10 does not have a timeout mechanism, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service

Please let me know how to fix this vulnerabilities in apache 2.2 httpd.?

Thanks
Ankit Jain
+919741336404
creator: ankyt.palrecha@gmail.com

text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not for support.  This was fixed in 2.2.x also, I'd suggest reading the changelog.
creator: covener@gmail.com
